snippet: At a news conference on Friday to welcome Jacoby Ellsbury, Yankees executives expressed surprise that Robinson Cano felt disrespected by the team’s $175 million offer to him.
abstract: Newly-acquired outfielder Jacoby Ellsbury praises New York Yankees for their hospitality after he is introduced as part of team at news conference; Yankees executives express surprise that second baseman Robinson Cano felt disrespected by team's $175 million offer to him before he signed with Seattle Mariners.
lead_paragraph: At a news conference on Friday to welcome Jacoby Ellsbury, Yankees executives expressed surprise that Robinson Cano felt disrespected by the team’s $175 million offer to him.

headline.main: Yanks Offer Welcome to Ellsbury and Some Rebuttals to Cano
headline.print_headline: While Opening Arms to Ellsbury, the Yankees Offer a Rebuttal to Cano
